data.actual_result: Overlay Crashes. (Note with no channel it will go to server but Hide chat)
data.short_description: [Overlay] Opening a Message Link to a Server you don't have Access too will Crash Overlay!
data.steps_to_repro: - Copy a link to a message - Edit the first Snowflake ID (This is Server) by changing one of the numbers in it! - Send this in a chat you can access in overlay - Open a game in overlay and Click the link
